mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY (COMMUNITY_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, DEL_YN, IMG, MEMBER_NO, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (SEQ_COMMUNITY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{enrollDate}, 'N', #{img}, #{memberNo}, #{communityCategoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMUNITY_NO, C.TITLE, C.CONTENT, TO_CHAR (C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, C.DEL_YN, M.NICK, T.NAME FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN COMMUNITY_COMMT N ON C.COMMUNITY_NO = N.COMMUNITY_NO JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY T ON C.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO = T.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT C.COMMUNITY_NO, C.TITLE, C.CONTENT, C.ENROLL_DATE, C.DEL_YN, C.IMG, M.NICK, N.CONTENT, T.NAME FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN COMMUNITY_COMMT N ON C.COMMUNITY_NO = N.COMMUNITY_NO JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY T ON C.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO = T.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO WHERE C.COMMUNITY_NO = #{communityCategoryNo} AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT C.COMMUNITY_NO, C.TITLE, C.CONTENT, TO_CHAR (C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, C.DEL_YN, M.NICK, T.NAME FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN COMMUNITY_COMMT N ON C.COMMUNITY_NO = N.COMMUNITY_NO JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY T ON C.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO = T.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = #{communityNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
